commands.name: IMGUI_BEGIN
commands.short_desc: Creates the window

commands.name: IMGUI_END
commands.short_desc: Ends the window

commands.name: IMGUI_CHECKBOX
commands.short_desc: Creates the checkbox

commands.name: IMGUI_BUTTON
commands.short_desc: Creates the button

commands.name: IMGUI_COLOR_BUTTON
commands.short_desc: Creates the button with custom colors

commands.name: IMGUI_INVISIBLE_BUTTON
commands.short_desc: Creates the invisible button

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_WINDOW_POS
commands.short_desc: Sets the current window position. Must be called inside Begin()...End()

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_WINDOW_SIZE
commands.short_desc: Sets the current window size. Must be called inside Begin()...End()

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_NEXT_WINDOW_POS
commands.short_desc: Sets the current window position. Applies to the next window ( aka Begin() )

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_NEXT_WINDOW_SIZE
commands.short_desc: Sets the current window size. Applies to the next window ( aka Begin() )

commands.name: IMGUI_DUMMY
commands.short_desc: Creates the dummy widget. Used for spacing

commands.name: IMGUI_TEXT
commands.short_desc: Creates the text line

commands.name: IMGUI_TEXT_DISABLED
commands.short_desc: Creates the text line with the disabled color ( Grayish by default )

commands.name: IMGUI_TEXT_WRAPPED
commands.short_desc: Creates the text line that wraps to a newline if the text goes beyond the window width

commands.name: IMGUI_TEXT_COLORED
commands.short_desc: Creates the text line of the given RGBA color (0.0f-1.0f)

commands.name: IMGUI_BULLET_TEXT
commands.short_desc: Creates the text line with a bullet point

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_TOOLTIP
commands.short_desc: Creates the popup window with the given text

commands.name: IMGUI_SAMELINE
commands.short_desc: Appends the next widget to the same line as the previous widget

commands.name: IMGUI_NEWLINE
commands.short_desc: Creates a new line for the next widget

commands.name: IMGUI_SPACING
commands.short_desc: Adds some spacing after the previous widget

commands.name: IMGUI_SEPARATOR
commands.short_desc: Adds a horizontal separator line

commands.name: IMGUI_NEXT_COLUMN
commands.short_desc: Puts the next widgets on the next column. Used alongside 0C16

commands.name: IMGUI_COLUMNS
commands.short_desc: Divides the window width into N columns. Close this with Columns(1)

commands.name: GET_FRAMERATE
commands.short_desc: Returns game FPS

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_VERSION
commands.short_desc: Returns the ImGui version

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_PLUGIN_VERSION
commands.short_desc: Returns the ImGuiRedux version

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_CURSOR_VISIBLE
commands.short_desc: Toggles the cursor

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_DISPLAY_SIZE
commands.short_desc: Returns the width & height of the display

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_FRAME_HEIGHT
commands.short_desc: Returns the ImGui frame height

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_WINDOW_POS
commands.short_desc: Returns the x,y coordinates of the window on the screen

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_WINDOW_SIZE
commands.short_desc: Returns the width and height of the window

commands.name: IMGUI_CALC_TEXT_SIZE
commands.short_desc: Returns the width and height of the given text

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_WINDOW_CONTENT_REGION_WIDTH
commands.short_desc: Returns the content region width of the window

commands.name: IMGUI_BEGIN_MAINMENUBAR
commands.short_desc: Creates the main menu bar

commands.name: IMGUI_END_MAINMENUBAR
commands.short_desc: Ends the main menu bar

commands.name: IMGUI_MENU_ITEM
commands.short_desc: Adds the menu item

commands.name: IMGUI_SELECTABLE
commands.short_desc: Adds the selectable widget

commands.name: IMGUI_BEGIN_CHILD
commands.short_desc: Creates a child window widget inside the main window

commands.name: IMGUI_END_CHILD
commands.short_desc: Ends the child window widget created with 0C25

commands.name: IMGUI_PUSH_ITEM_WIDTH
commands.short_desc: Sets the item width for the next widgets

commands.name: IMGUI_POP_ITEM_WIDTH
commands.short_desc: Removes the pushed item width (0C27) from the stack

commands.name: IMGUI_COLLAPSING_HEADER
commands.short_desc: Adds the collapsing header

commands.name: IMGUI_SLIDER_INT
commands.short_desc: Creates the int slider input

commands.name: IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
commands.short_desc: Creates the float slider input

commands.name: IMGUI_INPUT_FLOAT
commands.short_desc: Creates the float input

commands.name: IMGUI_INPUT_INT
commands.short_desc: Creates the int input

commands.name: IMGUI_INPUT_TEXT
commands.short_desc: Creates the text input

commands.name: IMGUI_RADIO_BUTTON
commands.short_desc: Creates the radio button

commands.name: IMGUI_COLOR_PICKER
commands.short_desc: Creates the color picker and sets the default color (0-255)

commands.name: IMGUI_BEGIN_FRAME
commands.short_desc: Creates a unique frame with its own space in memory. End it with 0C32. MUST BE UNIQUE!

commands.name: IMGUI_END_FRAME
commands.short_desc: Ends unique ImGui frame

commands.name: IMGUI_IS_ITEM_ACTIVE
commands.short_desc: Returns true if the previous widget is in active state

commands.name: IMGUI_IS_ITEM_CLICKED
commands.short_desc: Returns true if the previous widget is clicked

commands.name: IMGUI_IS_ITEM_FOCUSED
commands.short_desc: Returns true if the previous widget is focused

commands.name: IMGUI_IS_ITEM_HOVERED
commands.short_desc: Returns true if the previous widget is hovered with mouse

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_SCALING_SIZE
commands.short_desc: Returns the width and height scaling factor based on the window size

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_NEXT_WINDOW_TRANSPARENCY
commands.short_desc: Sets the background transparency of next window (0.0f-1.0f)

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_MESSAGE
commands.short_desc: Displays a text message on top left corner of the screen. Useful for games without `showTextBox(...)` support

commands.name: IMGUI_ARROW_BUTTON
commands.short_desc: Creates the arrow button in the specified direction

commands.name: IMGUI_BULLET
commands.short_desc: Creates a bullet point

commands.name: IMGUI_COMBO
commands.short_desc: Creates a combo box widget. Pass options separated by commas "item1,item2,item3"

commands.name: IMGUI_IMAGE_BUTTON
commands.short_desc: Creates a ImGui button with specified image

commands.name: IMGUI_LOAD_IMAGE
commands.short_desc: Loads a image file from disk. Relative to CLEO directory

commands.name: IMGUI_FREE_IMAGE
commands.short_desc: Frees a loaded image data

commands.name: IMGUI_TEXT_CENTERED
commands.short_desc: Displays a center aligned ImGui text widget

commands.name: IMGUI_PUSH_STYLE_VAR
commands.short_desc: Pushes a ImGuiStyleVar value to the stack. Use PopStyleVar to undo the effect

commands.name: IMGUI_PUSH_STYLE_VAR2
commands.short_desc: Pushes a ImGuiStyleVar value to the stack. Use PopStyleVar to undo the effect

commands.name: IMGUI_PUSH_STYLE_COLOR
commands.short_desc: Pushes a ImGuiCol value to the stack. Use PopStyleColor to undo the effect

commands.name: IMGUI_POP_STYLE_VAR
commands.short_desc: Removes the recent imGuiStyleVar from the stack

commands.name: IMGUI_POP_STYLE_COLOR
commands.short_desc: Removes the recent ImGuiCol from the stack

commands.name: IMGUI_TABS
commands.short_desc: Pass tab names separated by comma. Returns the index of the visible tab

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_IMAGE_BG_COLOR
commands.short_desc: Sets image background color

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_IMAGE_TINT_COLOR
commands.short_desc: Sets image tint color

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_FOREGROUND_DRAWLIST
commands.short_desc: Returns pointer to foreground draw list

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_BACKGROUND_DRAWLIST
commands.short_desc: Returns pointer to ImGui background drawlist

commands.name: IMGUI_GET_WINDOW_DRAWLIST
commands.short_desc: Returns pointer to ImGui window drawList

commands.name: IMGUI_DRAWLIST_ADD_TEXT
commands.short_desc: Adds text at specified position

commands.name: IMGUI_DRAWLIST_ADD_LINE
commands.short_desc: Adds a line form point A to B

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_ITEM_INT
commands.short_desc: Sets the value of input int & slider int widget

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_ITEM_FLOAT
commands.short_desc: Sets the value of input float & slider float widget

commands.name: IMGUI_SET_ITEM_TEXT
commands.short_desc: Sets value of input text widget
